definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: According to Marxist theory, the Concept of Life and Death is exactly the World Outlook.

sentences.english: I am not able, and I do not want, completely to abandon the world-view that I acquired in childhood.

sentences.english: It is obvious that the issue of Weltanschauung has been becoming one of the most important subjects in western philosophy for more than hundred years.

sentences.english: But I did change Maya's perspective for at least that evening.

sentences.english: They are being digitally remembered with our world view overlaid on top.
